Table of Contents

Name

tabommod - tabulate an Osipkov-Merritt model

Synopsis

tabommod [parameter=value]

Description

Tabulate the radius, mass, potential and distribution function of a binary Osipkov-Merritt model file.

Parameters

The following parameters are recognized in order; they may be given in any order if the keyword is also given. Use --help to confirm this man page is up to date.
in=
input OM model. No default.

Examples


  %tabommod /home/teuben/NEMO/nemo/data/k1isot.dat | head
  
  # Radius Mass Potential DistFunc
  0 0 -2.13846 0.308038
  0.0532665 0.00225881 -2.11708 0.303906
  0.0756551 0.00636147 -2.09569 0.299206
  0.0930611 0.0116363 -2.07431 0.294226

See Also

mkommod(1NEMO) , plummer(1NEMO)

Files

$NEMODAT/k1isot.dat - example

OM file

Author

Peter Teuben
